sect2.title: Installation de GDM
sect2.para: Installez GDM en lançant les commandes suivantes:

userinput.command: groupadd gdm && useradd -c gdm -d /dev/null -g gdm -s /bin/bash gdm && ./configure --prefix=$GNOME_PREFIX --sysconfdir=/etc/gnome \ --localstatedir=/var/lib --with-pam-prefix=/etc && make && make install
